title: Ransomed MC Princess #1
description: I've had two great loves in my life. One I fought against and one I succumbed to. One was my light and the other pulled me into darkness.This isn't the story of how I was taken captive. This is the story of everything that led up to it--every beautiful, aching, passionate moment that created the memories I live for even though it hurts so much to remember them.I was the President's daughter. He was the son of the VP. Everyone but us thought we were made for each other. I couldn't believe how stupid they were until the night I finally saw the boy I grew up with as the man he'd become...The night everything in my world changed...The night I met him.Damien thought he'd saved me. Instead, he sealed my fate.
author: Vivian Cove
